statement.p: A certain bread recipe asks you to combine flour and yeast with 4 cups of warm 115 째F water. If the water is hotter or colder than that, then the bread won't rise.
All you have available are boiling water that is 220 째F and refrigerated water that is 40 째F.
How much boiling water and refrigerated water should you mix together to get 4 cups of 115 째F water?

p.em: Round your answers to 2 decimal places.
